heading: rules are for making
subheading: new economy maybe you’ve noticed too: these days, any self-help business preacher worth his or her gestalt is throwing a rule book at the new economy. in the 17 months since wired executive editor kevin kelly suggested “12 dependable principles for thriving in a turbulent world” (wired 5.09, page 140), his new rules for the […]
author: brad wieners
